title: Claiming Emma
description: [Siren Ménage Everlasting: Erotic Paranormal Ménage a Quatre Romance, M/F/M/M, shape-shifters, HEA]Emma Steele is all alone in Alaska after a tragic accident forces her to leave the comfort of her home and family in Seattle. She has too many secrets and can’t seem to move forward with her life. Feeling alone, she’s desperate for love and affection.Chayton Youngblood is the youngest brother of three. His destiny is to leave home and find a mate to share with his siblings. Luckily, he doesn’t need to travel far since his mate came to him. He rescues her and takes her home, but not to his brothers…instead, he wants to keep her all to himself.Mahkah and Takoda are waiting for their brother to bring home their mate. After six weeks, they take control of the situation. Unfortunately, Emma and Chayton are attacked before she can even meet her other mates. Without Chayton conscious, his brothers scramble to earn Emma’s trust and love.Note: There is no sexual relationship or touching for titillation between or among siblings.
author: Alicia White
